<title level="1" pfs="">[Chew Spider](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2227)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Chew Spider](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2227)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 69</row>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), web sense

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +2, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -4
</row>

**Web Sense** The chew spiders have [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) to detect the vibrations of creatures touching their web (which stretches through the entire fangberry thicket).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 22

**Immunities**
precision, swarm mind

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 2, piercing 5, slashing 5

**Weaknesses**
area damage 5, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 20 feet

**Chewing Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the chew spiders' space takes 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) (DC 16 basic Reflex save). A creature that fails its save is exposed to chew spider venom.

**Chew Spider Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 18; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage and clumsy 2 (1 round).

</column>
name: Chew Spider
